title: Identify the Tool's Purpose
text: The 'Sort Descending' tool is used to organize data in a specific order.

title: Consider the Order
text: The tool arranges data starting from the largest value and moving to the smallest.

title: Focus on Data Arrangement
text: This tool does not change the appearance of the data, such as font color or cell merging.

title: Eliminate Incorrect Options
text: The tool is not used for calculations like summing up a column.

hintAnswer: To arrange data from largest to smallest
title: Select the Correct Function
text: The primary function of the 'Sort Ascending' tool is to arrange data from largest to smallest.
choices: To arrange data from largest to smallest
To change the font color of text
To merge multiple cells into one
To calculate the sum of a column
